channel.title: DuckDB on MCP Toolbox for Databases
channel.description: Recent content in DuckDB on MCP Toolbox for Databases

item.title: dgraph-dql
item.description:
About

A duckdb-sql tool executes a pre-defined SQL statement against a DuckDB database. It is compatible with any DuckDB source configuration as defined in the DuckDB source documentation.

The specified SQL statement is executed as a prepared statement, and parameters are inserted according to their position: e.g., $1 is the first parameter, $2 is the second, and so on. If template parameters are included, they are resolved before execution of the prepared statement.
